name: UnionHIVBDE165AndHIVBDE165
title: Union of Offer other clinical services ValueSet And Offer other clinical services ValueSet

concept.display: Hepatitis B (HBV) and hepatitis C virus (HCV) testing and treatment provided
Co-trimoxazole chemoprophylaxis to prevent Pneumocystis carinii pneumonia provided
Intensified TB case finding and linkage to TB treatment provided
Provision of isoniazid preventive therapy if person does not have TB
Malaria prevention (such as bed nets and prophylaxis), depending on epidemiology
